title: Episode 428 | "Keeping Up With the Joneses"
description:
On this episode: Joe and the guys discuss Summer Walker welcoming her new daughter, Bubble Gum (11:27), Coi Leary receiving body-shaming backlash for her promo video (18:00), and prom with Trey Budden (29:45). Freddie Gibbs calls into the JBP (46:20), Bhad Bhabie joins OnlyFans (54:00), and Lil Uzi & Yung Miami get into a heated argument on Instagram live (1:19:00). New York and New Jersey legalize recreational marijuana (1:24:00), Snowfall recapped, Chet Hanks and MORE!

 

For more exclusive content: become a Patron of the The Joe Budden Podcast at www.patreon.com/JoeBudden

Sleeper Picks:

Joe | Nas - “You’re Da Man”

Ish | Jay-Z - “Blueprint 2”

Parks | Keith Murray - “The Most Beautifullest In The World” 

Ice | Bankroll Freddie - “Add It Up”
